attributes.action: Start a bus route from stroud to bristol
attributes.additional_details: In stroud many people work in bristol/near bristol. By car to get to the closest part of bristol is about 35 minutes. If you wanted to take another transport it would take atleast 2 hours 30 minutes and over 20 pounds. Bristol is the most visited city with the most jobs/shops/activities for the stroud community. I believe this would make a huge difference to our town and many other towns near stroud. the lack of public transport stops people from finding opportunity/suited jobs/activities there.
attributes.background: For the goverment to open a new and quicker route going from Stroud to Bristol via Bus.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus services are a matter for local bus operators and the relevant local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
